attributes.action: Have parking on all 'A' Roads banned from 0700 to 1900 to improve traffic flow, speed journeys,reduce accidents and emissions.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It has always seemed ludicrous to me that we spend billions to build and maintain 'A' class roads in order to facilitate road transport in getting from A to B. We then set about making the flow of traffic very difficult and often dangerous by allowing parking almost anywhere along their lengths.
